name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Visage Cloud
description: This is a repository of visage cloud APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Visage Cloud
apis.description: We employ a wide range of state-of-the-art techniques ranging from deep learning and neural networks to conventional machine learning algorithms and big data management to ensure a smooth experience for your face recognition and classification needs
